successes.title: Instacube: A Living Canvas for your Instagram Photos
successes.description: Liberating Instagram photos from your smart device, Instacube feeds your favorite images wirelessly at 3x the size.

Pledges.description: Every little bit counts! Since we love your support, we'll give your Instagram handle a special shout-out on our website. Tag your photos with #Instacube to connect with our growing community!
For your generous donation, we'll hook you up with a super fly American ApparelÂ®  Instacube T-Shirt! You'll be able to show off to the world that you supported this awesome kickstarter project!
Early Adopter Special! One "Classic" Instacube. There are only 1,000 Instacubes at this sweet price, and they are reserved exclusively for our first Kickstarter supporters!
One "Classic" Instacube. It's sexy, and because you want it first, Kickstarter  is the only place we're offering the presale.
Early Adopter "Lover's Pair!" Two "Classic" Instacubes offered at a super low price! Instacube makes a great gift and we're confident if you love Instacube, you have a loved one who will too!
We love you and we wanted to offer a few more Instacube "Lover's Pairs" at a special Kickstarter price. This reward is only open from 9/13-9/21 so grab this sweet deal while you can!

Collector's Limited Edition Instacube! This is a VIP batch just for VIP Kickstarter backers! One "Vintage Spring" Instacube in Kickstarter Green, individually numbered ___/1000 and laser engraved with your Instagram handle or name (optional). This is the only time we will ever offer Instacube in this amazing throwback retro green!

"Lover's Pair" of Instacubes. Two "Classic" Instacubes for him and her, him and him, her and her, home and work, grandparent and grandkid, near and far or any other combo you can come up with! Since you're willing to buy two, we're willing to give you a price break off of retail :).
Instacube Backer Blowout! For our final three days, we're offering a sultry Instacube Trio in any color combination you desire for a fraction of the anticipated $199 retail price.
Instacube Six-Pack. Cheers to you and your extended friends & family or boutique shop!

Instacube "Baller Pack!" Nine Instacubes and an invitation to our VIP CES Penthouse Party in Las Vegas this January. (Transportation and accommodations are not included... but this will be the #BestPartyatCES we promise!)
10 Instacubes, custom skinned & designed just for you with the promise of first dibs on orders for retail next March! Email for more details

Instacube Design Experience! Looking to make some custom Instacubes for your business or clients? Join us for an Instacube Design Session & Adventure with Instacube Designer John Whaley at D2M's office in Mountain View, CA! E-mail for more details on this once in a lifetime opportunity! We will hook you up with Instacubes and the experience will blow your mind. We promise. (Transportation and accommodations are not included but a great time is assured.)
